name: UrbanEdgeNY
tag_list: rentals, nyc, no-fee, apartment, real-estate, tech, startup
overview:
Urban Edge makes it simple to find your perfect home by connecting you directly to building owners and property managers. No fees, and best of all, no brokers.

Urban Edge was created as a venue for owners, property managers, and leasing managers to market their New York apartments for rent directly to tenants. No brokers, no expensive fees, no bait and switch ads.
